entry.title: Eco ChemLabs - Fryer & Griddle Cleaner - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eco Chemlabs
Type: Disposables
Price: 8.49

Eco ChemLabs Fryer and Griddle Cleaner formula is an alkaline solution, it removes heavy duty grease and carbon fast and it is most economical oven maintenance. It is non-flammable, non-corrosive and non-toxic in diluted strength. Our premium formulation quickly penetrates and emulsifies baked on grease, oil and carbon on metal surfaces, leaving behind a clean and odor free surface.

Specifications:

How to Use

Deep Fryer

Scrap off or hose down to remove excess grease. Fill up to 10 cm from the top using cold water. Dilute 1:27-1:40 and boil the solution for 30 minutes. Drain and flush hot water. Scrub the grease residue while it is still warm. Rinse well with potable water, then wipe dry.

Griddle

Prepare a 1:1 solution and apply liberally using a cloth or brush, apply the concentrate directly to walls, racks, burner and glass. Let work for 5-15 minutes. Stubborn areas may need light rubbing using a soft nylon scrubbing pad. Rinse well with potable water, then wipe dry.

Oven

Preheat oven to 80°C (180°F) then shut-off before applying. Using a brush, apply the concentrate directly to walls, racks, burners and glass. Let work for 5-15 minutes. Stubborn areas may need light rubbing using a soft nylon scrubbing pad. Rinse well with potable water, then wipe dry.

Product Code: 45538
Packaging Size: 4L, 20L, 200L

Product is Free of:

  • Petroleum Solvent
  • Phosphates
  • Mineral Acids
  • Nitrilotriacetic acid
  • Monoamines
  • Diamines

entry.title: Sprakita - Oven & Grill Buster - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sprakita
Type: Disposables
Price: 7.99

Enjoy the look of a clean oven without leftover residue when you use this oven and grill cleaner!

This oven and grill cleaner has a highly-active caustic formulation removing baked-on food carbon and grease. For quick and effortless cleaning, it can be used on ovens, grills, hotplates, deep fryers and BBQ's.

  • Cleans Your Grill Safely And Easily
  • Works Great On Grills, Cookers, Smokers, Oven, Microwaves, and More
  • Non-Flammable, Non-Corrosive, Non-Toxic, Biodegradable and Phosphate Free
  • Save Money By Cleaning When Your Grill Is Cool
  • Utilizes Degreaser To Provide Safe And Powerful Cleaning Experience

    Deep Cleaning

    To ensure ideal results, the foaming qualities allow the cleaner to cling to dirt deposits without damaging the material surface. Plus, since it is made with foam builders and stabilizers, grease cutting agents, and pH neutralizers, this oven and grill cleaner is sure to get the job done.

    Instructions Included

    Safety and use instructions are located directly on the label to clearly inform the user of proper handling techniques, a definite benefit in a work environment!

  • Safe on Many Surfaces

    This cleaner is safe on a variety of surfaces such as iron, steel, stainless steel, nickel, porcelain, and glass! Use it on a warm surface around 160 degrees Fahrenheit for best results.

    Penetrating Foam

    In addition, this product foams and clings onto surfaces for a deeper clean than other products. This gets the job done quickly and efficiently to ensure a spotless kitchen.

entry.title: Crown - Auto Dish Rinse N Dry - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown
Type: Disposables
Price: 16.99

Crown - Auto Dish Rinse N Dry - 4 L

Use rinse aid to speed the drying of your restaurant's dishes and glassware.

A cost effective liquid machine rinse agent to best suit your water conditions and temperature by providing exceptional wetting to promote spot free dyring of glassware and cutlery.

  • 100% better drying vs detergent alone
  • Removes spots & residue for brilliant shine
  • Glass Protection ingredient for lasting shine
  • Rinse aid and wetting agent will speed up drying time in your restaurant's high-temperature dishwashing machine. This chemical can be used in medium to moderately hard water and contains a specially formulated drying agent that is best suited for use on china, silverware, glasses, and plasticware, should only be used in automatic dispensing systems, and its concentrated formula ensures quick, spot-free drying and rapid sheeting. This product is sure to brighten your restaurant's dishes and impress customers.

entry.title: Classik - Concentrated Bleach 6% - 5 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Classik
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.49

  • Clean and deodorize with the power of Clorox Bleach concentrated formula.
  • For use in HE and standard washing machines.
  • Eliminates up to 99.9 percent of household dirt and grime.
  • Perfect for cleaning around your home or office. Easy to grip handle prevents spills.
  • Keeping your work place safe and germ-free is critically important, so bleach is perfect for even the toughest applications! This bleach has been proven to kill 50+ specific germs, including MRSA, staph, strep, athlete's foot, C. difficile, influenza, and other infectious pathogens. While the value of keeping your staff and your guests safe from catching or transmitting diseases speaks for itself, Pure Bright bleach also offers significant cost savings over other national brands.

    In janitorial applications, this bleach is ideal for disinfecting and deodorizing nonporous surfaces such as floors, walls, work surfaces, and restroom fixtures. Simply dilute with water to create an effective disinfecting solution! It is perfect for use in healthcare facilities, offices, schools, nursing homes, day-cares, or hotels. Plus, this versatile bleach has a number of uses in a variety of food service applications. For instance, it can be used to sanitize and deodorize nonporous food-contact surfaces such as dishes, utensils, and restaurant equipment as well as porous surfaces such as cutting boards and butcher blocks.

    In addition to janitorial and food service applications, bleach offers an effective and economical way to clean fabrics and clothes. Dilute with water to create the perfect sanitizing and stain-removing solution for all of your commercial laundry needs.

entry.title: Kosmo Kleen - Auto Dish Sanitizer - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kosmo Kleen
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.99

Keep dishes sparkling clean and sanitized with this dish washing machine sanitizer.

Great for kitchens in restaurants, hotels, and hospitals, this sanitizer is intended for low temperature dish washing machines. Convenient and easy-to-use, this sanitizer takes the hassle and guesswork out of sanitizing your dishes. Connect the container to your unit and move on to other tasks as your dish washing machine takes care of the rest.

Bulk Container

This sanitizer comes in a bulk gallon container to keep your facility in good supply as you wash your dishes.

Convenient Handle

Great for transporting this sanitizer around the kitchen, this handle provides a secure grip as you move it out of storage to connect it to your machine.

entry.title: Kosmo Kleen - Auto Dishwasher Detergent - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kosmo Clean
Type: Disposables
Price: 11.99

Kosmo Kleen - Auto Dishwasher Detergent - 4 L

Remove light to medium grease and food stains with  automatic warewashing detergent

A perfect option for the value-minded buyer, this automatic warewashing detergent effectively cleans dishes and flatware at a bargain price! When used at the proper concentration in your dish machine, this detergent will easily wash away everyday food soils and grease from your dishware. For best results, use in soft to medium water hardness conditions. This detergent is not recommended for use on soft metals like aluminum and pewter.

High or Low Temp

This versatile formula can be used in both high and low temperature dish machines. It is most effective in soft to medium water hardness conditions.

Large Handle

The bottle's large handle is easy to hold, making it more comfortable for your employees to tote around.

High concentration of sequestering agents eliminate the need for machine and dish descaling. Uses alkaline cleaners . Use in food plant and commercial operations. Great for hard water use. For use in commercial operations for exceptional removal of grease and soil.

entry.title: Diversey Break-up - Professional Oven & Grill Cleaner Aerosol - 539 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diversey
Type: Disposables
Price: 8.99

Institutional formula with heavy-duty cleaning power for fast and easy cleaning of institutional, industrial and commercial surfaces.

This oven and grill cleaner has a highly-active caustic formulation removing baked-on food carbon and grease. For quick and effortless cleaning, it can be used on ovens, grills, hotplates, deep fryers and BBQ's.

  • NSF listed and Kosher certified
  • Breaks down tough, baked-on grease and grime on contact, even on cold surfaces
  • Cleans commercial ovens and grills more quickly and easily, minimizing scrubbing and scouring
  • Attacks grease and grime on ovens, grills, fryers and more with fast-acting formula
  • Extra power cleans away even the toughest carbonized soils
  • Conveniently sprays from any angle to penetrate tough-to-reach areas
  • Cleans Your Grill Safely And Easily
  • Works Great On Grills, Cookers, Smokers, Oven, Microwaves, and More
  • Non-Flammable, Non-Corrosive, Non-Toxic, Biodegradable and Phosphate Free
  • Save Money By Cleaning When Your Grill Is Cool
  • Utilizes Degreaser To Provide Safe And Powerful Cleaning Experience

    Deep Cleaning

    To ensure ideal results, the foaming qualities allow the cleaner to cling to dirt deposits without damaging the material surface. Plus, since it is made with foam builders and stabilizers, grease cutting agents, and pH neutralizers, this oven and grill cleaner is sure to get the job done.

    Instructions Included

    Safety and use instructions are located directly on the label to clearly inform the user of proper handling techniques, a definite benefit in a work environment!

  • Safe on Many Surfaces

    This cleaner is safe on a variety of surfaces such as iron, steel, stainless steel, nickel, porcelain, and glass! Use it on a warm surface around 160 degrees Fahrenheit for best results.

    Penetrating Foam

    In addition, this product foams and clings onto surfaces for a deeper clean than other products. This gets the job done quickly and efficiently to ensure a spotless kitchen.

entry.title: Drano - Professional Strength Kitchen Crystals & Drain Cleaner - 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Drano
Type: Disposables
Price: 11.99

Drano Full Clog Destroyer is a powerful drain cleaner that is specially formulated to take on the toughest clogs. The thick gel holds together to cut through standing water and attack built-up hair, gunk and soap scum. It gets to work fast, eliminating stubborn blockages and leaving your drain free-flowing and clog-free. Full Clog Destroyer is safe for all septic systems and pipes, including PVC, plastic, copper and old pipes. Keep your drains clear with Liquid-Plumr.

  1. Professional drain cleaner
  1. Clears stubborn fully blocked drains
  1. Special thick gel wont dilute as it cuts through the toughest clogs
  1. Safe for all pipes, including PVC, plastic, copper, old pipes and septic systems
  1. Saves time and money by empowering you to clear drains yourself
